title: Creating folders
creator: inspiredmac1
content: Whether I use the File > New Folder from the menu or right-click on a message in the Inbox, I can't seem to create a new folder.

title: Bulk editing spam filters.
creator: jbread
content:
I want to change the folder to which I currently send my spam filters on my Mac. I understand how I can edit them individually and handle new filters, however I have several hundred accumulated filters created over the years and doing so individually will be very time consuming. Is there a method I can use to change all existing spam filter's destination folder in a single step. I know a bit about using Config Editor, Chrome css, probably just enough to get my self in trouble. I see several spam filter files within the Thunderbird folder, but not sure if they are germane.

Any help will be greatly appreciated.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;os:Mac running OSX 15.7.3. and Thunderbird 147.0.1

title: no longer room for messages on the screen
creator: mskinsey
content: This might also belong under accessibility. Or how to organize the screen? At this point I cannot get some messages because there is no space left for it. This has happened gradually but now its impossible. I will attach a screen shot to show the problem. (I would have a tiny bit more room if I could get rid of that line of tags since they come on a dropdown anyway. Thank you so much,
